title: Emmys 2019: Phoebe Waller-Bridge Wins Best Comedy Actress
text:
Photo: 2019 Getty Images

If you bet the farm in your high-stakes, highly illegal underground Emmys gambling pool on Julia Louis-Dreyfus taking home Best Actress in a Comedy again this year, you might want to go ahead and get the hell out of town. On Sunday, Fleabag star Phoebe Waller-Bridge took home Outstanding Lead Actress in a Comedy, her second award of the night and, based on her reaction, a huge surprise she did not mentally prepare for. “Oh my god, no,” she gushed, cradling her statuette. Thank you. I find acting really hard and really painful, but it’s all about this.”

“Thank you to be nominated with these unbelievable actresses who I have just looked up to and watched, and laughed at and with, for so many years,” she continued. “It means so much. This means a huge, huge amount to me.” So if your money was on the Veep star, that’s understandable. You couldn’t have known eleven time-winner Julia Louis-Dreyfus, who took home the award in 2017, 2016, 2015, 2014, 2013, 2012, 2006 and 1996, wouldn’t win the award again this year. And hey, if it makes you feel any better, she will undoubtedly be back up there soon/twenty more times.
description: Phoebe Waller-Bridge wins Outsanding Lead Actress in a comedy, unseating reigning comedy queen Julia Louis Dreyfus, at the 2019 Emmys
